# Darwhin Gomez

**Contact Information**  
2055 Saint Raymond Avenue 1-H  
Bronx, New York, 10462  
Darwhin88@gmail.com  |  347-491-2955  |  [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)  |  [GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)  

---

## Professional Summary  
Solutions-focused technologist with over 10 years of experience in software development, specializing in cloud architecture and secure service design. Proven ability to lead technical teams and influence system architecture, ensuring high scalability and operational excellence. Adept at leveraging a diverse technology stack, including Java, Python, and AWS, to deliver impactful solutions in collaborative environments. Committed to continuous learning and innovation, with a strong focus on simplicity, usability, and security.

---

## Core Skills

- **Cloud Services:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB), Azure (App Service, Functions)  
- **Databases:** PostgreSQL, Oracle, MySQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB
